title: NOCO-NOCO ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC ALLIANCE WITH TESNOLOGY TO ADVANCE SMART CITY INITIATIVES - PR Newswire
summary: Noco-noco and Tesnology have formed a strategic alliance to develop RCTnm devices for energy management in smart cities, aiming to promote sustainability and decarbonization. The collaboration focuses on creating a smart city environment with optimized energy consumption and democratic data management.
green_innovation: TRUE. This collaboration between Noco-noco and Tesnology aligns with the definition of green innovation by promoting sustainability, energy efficiency, and decarbonization through the development of innovative technologies for smart cities.
business_innovation: TRUE. The partnership between Noco-noco and Tesnology to create RCTnm devices for smart cities represents a significant business innovation, introducing new products that differ from traditional energy management solutions and aiming to revolutionize energy storage and usage.
green_product: TRUE. The RCTnm devices developed by Noco-noco and Tesnology can be considered green products as they focus on energy-efficient batteries, sustainable energy management, and democratized data control to reduce environmental impact and promote eco-friendly practices.
green_process: TRUE. The development of RCTnm devices by Noco-noco and Tesnology involves innovative green processes for energy management in smart cities that aim to minimize environmental impacts, optimize energy consumption, and promote sustainability through advanced technologies.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335999 (All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing), 221122 (Electric Power Distribution), 541715 (Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences), 221119 (Other Electric Power Generation)
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it focuses on genuine partnerships and innovations aimed at sustainable energy management and decarbonization.

title: SpinetiX launches iBX line with iBX410 player - Digital Signage Today
summary: SpinetiX has launched its iBX line of players with the debut of its iBX410 model designed for 24/7 digital signage use, with enhanced hardware production and software functionalities.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334220 - Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing, 334310 - Audio and Video Equipment Manufacturing, 334419 - Other Electronic Component Manufacturing, 334516 - Analytical Laboratory Instrument Manufacturing
